refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Run the &pdfTeX; typesetter on file, usually creating file.pdf. If the file argument has no extension, .tex will be appended to it. Instead of a file name, a set of &pdfTeX; commands can be given, the first of which must start with a backslash.
&pdfTeX; is a version of &TeX; that can create &PDF; files as well as &DVI; files.
In &PDF; mode, &pdfTeX; can natively handle the &PDF;, &JPG;, and &PNG; graphics formats.
